name: The prophetic dream of a Princess
description: The Princess of a tea bowl-towns Almalyk has a special gift of divination since she was a child that has been passed through generations from grandmother to granddaughter. One day she sees a prophetic dream about the future. According to her dream, on the day of vernal equinox, when the night and day become equal, a savior shall arrive to the tea-bowl towns. It is believed that the savior will be able to find the sacred Book of Destiny, where the destiny of all living beings and all folk is inscribed. With the help of the book the Almalykers hope to win the unbeatable army of the red skin giants Zardakhisha. But on the most awaited day instead of a mighty fearless warrior to the tea bowl-towns arrives a little girl. That is how Amina becomes a savior from the prophecy.
